headline: Assessing Corpay’s Valuation After Recent Share Price Rebound in 2025
summary: If you have been wondering whether Corpay at around $310 a share is a bargain or a value trap, you are not alone. This breakdown is designed to give you a clear, no jargon view of what you might really be buying. The stock has bounced recently, up about 5.0% over the last week and 12.3% over the past month, even though it is still down roughly 8.6% year to date and about 15.1% over the last year after a strong 69.3% run over three years. Behind those moves, investors have been reacting to...
